title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 30.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 30.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the application
process, evaluation criteria and administration procedures for financial
assistance under the Economic Development Skills Training Program. The purpose
of the Economic Development Skills Training Program is to provide assistance to
eligible applicants for the purpose of providing skills development training
which fosters economic development by creating or preserving jobs in New York

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
30.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
